thread.title: Nick Hawkins

author: Nick Hawkins
title: Nick Hawkins
text: I have used a few mobile tyre fitters in that past (eTyres, AA) but for some reason they no longer cover my area in Bournemouth. Ben B was a good fitter, being friendly, courteous, smart and efficient. He also explained my query over his arrival time, which was earlier than I'd been told in the email, which actually suited me. I'll be using again and recommending. The budget tyres fitted were also cheaper than other prices that I'd been Quote: d by garages who wouldn't fit them on my drive!
